description: A meta-decorator that builds upon previous context or responses rather than starting from scratch. This enables continuity across interactions, allowing refinement, extension, or alteration of previous outputs in a coherent manner.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: What to build upon from the previous context

parameters.name: approach
parameters.description: How to build upon the referenced content

parameters.name: preserveStructure
parameters.description: Whether to maintain the structure of the referenced content

examples.description: Basic extension of the previous response
examples.usage:
+++BuildOn
Add more detail about implementation challenges.
examples.result: Extends the previous response by adding more detailed information about implementation challenges while maintaining continuity

examples.usage:
+++BuildOn(reference=specific, approach=refine, preserveStructure=false)
Improve the section on risk analysis with more quantitative measures.
examples.result: Refines specifically the risk analysis section from the previous content with more quantitative measures, potentially restructuring it
